recipe_name: Butterflied Roast Chicken with Lemon and Rosemary
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed, 1 (3 pound) whole chicken, backbone removed,   kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste, 1  lemon, sliced into rounds, 4 sprigs fresh rosemary,   +   1/2 cup white wine
nutrition: Total Fat 12g 15%, Saturated Fat 3g 15%, Cholesterol 114mg 38%, Sodium 178mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 3g 1%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 0g, Protein 37g, Vitamin C 14mg 70%, Calcium 34mg 3%, Iron 2mg 10%, Potassium 354mg 8%
